CustomField.description: A semi-colon delimited list of values to allow. ex: email, Account name, etc. If there is a value in this field, the feature will ONLY be on for these given values.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A semi-colon delimited list of values to allow. ex: email, Account name, etc. If there is a value in this field, the feature will ONLY be on for these given values.
CustomField.label: Values to Allow
